div.ab:
وعلى حامل كتاب يوقّق القاضي عليه ويختمه
وسلّمه ويسلّمه لصاحب الرّهن بيدك

wa ʿalà ḥāmili kitāb:in yuwaqqifi ăl qāḍī ʿalay hi wa yaḫtim hu
wa sallim yusallim hu li ṣāḥibi ăr rahni bi yadi ka

[A]nd the carrier of the letter ought see to that the judge looks at it and seals it off with a stamp. The carrier of the letter [should see to it] that the judge looks at it and seals it off with a stamp.
And [then] deliver it, by hand, to the person who owes the rahn-security deposit. And [then] you deliver it, by hand, to the person who pledges commenda property for a debt (ṣāḥib al-rahn).
